title: U.S. Eases AI Rules Amid Technological Race with China
description: The Trump administration is unveiling a new plan to ease regulations on artificial intelligence (AI) in the U.S., aiming to bolster its position in the technological race against China. This plan marks a significant policy shift from former President Biden's restrictive approach, focusing on expanding AI exports and development.
